subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After Yogi Berra’s death, Ford, a big-game pitcher who went 236-106 over 16 seasons, is worthy of a distinction that also belonged to Babe Ruth and Joe DiMaggio.
snippet: After Yogi Berra’s death, Ford, a big-game pitcher who went 236-106 over 16 seasons, is worthy of a distinction that also belonged to Babe Ruth and Joe DiMaggio.
